mainText:
Well, five minutes ago I was noticed about this tragedy, I'm so sorry about this, let me tell you this is the worst new I've got this day, Steve was, is, will continue being my idol, I learnt a lot with his ideals, and I trust in him. I knew the moment was coming but I didn't think It would be sooner I thought. 
I repeat it again, I'm so sorry, and you, Steve, will be an idol and Hero to me.
author: Eduardo
